title: Electric potential at surface of two spheres

content.question: Two charged metal spheres are connected by a conducting wire. Sphere A is larger than sphere B. Which of the following is true of the magnitude of the electric potential at the surface of sphere A compared to that at the surface of sphere B ?

choices.label: It could be greater or less, depending on the ratio of the radii of the spheres.
It could be greater or less, depending on the charges of the spheres.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
